instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'System,' tap Accessibility . Tap Text-to-speech output .

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'System,' tap Accessibility. Tap Text-to-speech output . Tap Speech rate . Tap the radio button to choose desired speech rate: Very slow Slow Normal Fast Faster Very fast Rapid Very rapid Fastest If desired tap Listen to an example to hear an example of speech synthesis
